channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Session Guide to Azure AI Foundry @ Microsoft Ignite: Must-See Developer Sessions】Azure AI Foundry 会议指南 @ Microsoft Ignite：必看的开发人员会议

We curated the top sessions designed for hands-on learning, practical demos, and expert insights. item.title: 【Introducing Copilot auto model selection (preview)】Copilot 自动模型选择简介（预览版）
item.description: 【Faster responses, a lower chance of rate limiting, and 10% off premium requests for paid users - auto picks the best available model for each request based on current capacity and performance. With auto, you don't need to choose a specific model. Copilot automatical】更快的响应、更低的速率限制机会以及付费用户 10% 的高级请求折扣 - 根据当前容量和性能自动为每个请求选择最佳可用模型。使用汽车，您无需选择特定型号。副驾驶自动

item.title: 【Perform wide-sweeping refactors using C++ code editing tools for GitHub Copilot】使用 GitHub Copilot 的 C++ 代码编辑工具执行广泛的重构
item.description: 【[cta-button text="Sign up for our Private Preview" url="https://aka.ms/code-editing-tools-private-preview" color="btn-primary" align="center"] Refactoring a C++ codebase can often require tracking updates across various sections of multiple files to ensure accuracy and relevancy. item.title: 【Optimize Your C++ Build Times with GitHub Copilot】使用 GitHub Copilot 优化您的 C++ 构建时间
item.description: 【Long build times are one of the top pain points for C++ projects. If you’ve ever waited too long for a C++ build to finish, you know how much it can slow down your productivity. In past years, we introduced C++ Build Insights to help you analyze traces and find bottlenecks. However, we know that】构建时间长是 C++ 项目的最大痛点之一。如果您曾经等待 C++ 构建完成太长时间，您就会知道它会降低您的工作效率。在过去几年中，我们引入了 C++ Build Insights 来帮助您分析跟踪并查找瓶颈。然而，我们知道

item.title: 【Non-recursively deleting a binary tree in constant space: Rotating the tree】非递归删除常量空间中的二叉树：旋转树
item.description: 【Another algorithm for non-recursively deleting the nodes of a binary tree comes from boost. item.title: 【Fall 2025 Windows Musician Technology and Arm64 Update】2025 年秋季 Windows Musician 技术和 Arm64 更新
item.description: 【It's no surprise that Arm64 PCs hit a sweet spot for music creation and live performance. They are thin and light, have excellent battery life (I used a Surface Laptop 7 at the entire NAMM show and never had to charge it despite giving presentations and demos), great screens, USB-4 ports that support Thunderbolt 3, and are super quiet. They】毫不奇怪，Arm64 PC 非常适合音乐创作和现场表演。它们轻薄、电池续航时间长（我在整个 NAMM 展会上使用了 Surface Laptop 7，尽管进行了演示和演示，但从未需要充电）、出色的屏幕、支持 Thunderbolt 3 的 USB-4 端口，并且超级安静。他们

item.title: 【What’s New for C++ Developers in Visual Studio 2026 version 18.0】Visual Studio 2026 版本 18.0 中 C++ 开发人员的新增功能
item.description: 【Get ready to level up your C++ productivity, because Visual Studio 2026 version 18.0 is now generally available! You can take advantage of the new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements in your production environment.】准备好提高您的 C++ 生产力吧，因为 Visual Studio 2026 版本 18.0 现已全面发布！您可以在生产环境中利用新功能、错误修复和性能改进。

item.title: 【Aspire 13 - Aspireify anything】Aspire 13 - 渴望一切
item.description: 【Major release, major features Aspire 13 is here and it's - you guessed it - the biggest release yet. We are so excited to share the next major iteration of Aspire with you all, because it's packed with features that streamline the existing Aspire experience that you all know and love. From complete process overhauls like asp】主要版本、主要功能 Aspire 13 现已发布，您猜对了，它是迄今为止最大的版本。我们很高兴与大家分享 Aspire 的下一个主要版本，因为它包含了一些功能，可以简化你们都知道和喜爱的现有 Aspire 体验。从像asp这样的完整流程大修
